Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body (joining 65737) of a buff-coloured pottery storage-vessel, the fabric is red and grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393755) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393755)
